name: Jungle Adventure (itch) (emaluaen)
description:
Jungle Adventure is a running, jumping, and avoiding traps game to escape from the monster that follows you through the deep jungle.

Do you like adventure games? Jungle adventure awaits you.

Features :

+ Classic game play

+ Running fast

+ It has simple and beautiful graphics

+ Easy controls and intuitive game play

+ The ability to double jump

+ Super cool level

+ Traps a lot

+ Suitable for all ages and groups
